text: Mach, Pailatɨv osa anchɨ hamb imbɨr ñɨmŋgɨz are oram kɨvahɨnd han enduwaz Barabasɨv ahevaimar. Avɨz Pailatɨv kaz mbɨkɨr aŋkwɨnd hamb kɨrɨpa aŋkarɨpɨr ŋe Jisas ore kɨramŋgɨmar. Orɨmŋgɨz mach raz Pailatɨv Jisasɨh ŋe irɨvɨndɨnd oman insɨŋ ŋgame kamar. Ndɨn hɨrohe ai oŋkɨrandɨŋ orɨkavɨzuvar amar.
